description.displayText: Kelly has been babysitting our son twice weekly for over a month and has become someone we trust, rely on and our son absolutely adores. She is trustworthy, caring and intelligent. She is fantastic with understanding my sons needs and wants. He has toddler moments and she knows how to handle any tantrums or upsets respectfully and professionally. My son loves when Kelly comes over and talks about her until the next time she comes to babysit. You cannot go wrong hiring her to watch your children!
